item.title: A Playbook for Law Firms and Colleges to Stand Up to President Trump
item.description: Law firms and universities do not need to capitulate. Here’s how they can fight back.

item.title: ‘Adolescence’ and the Surprising Difficulty of Hugging a Teen Son
item.description: I didn’t know how to tear down that wall of silence and mystery that creeps up between parents and their teens, but I knew doing so was essential.

item.title: ‘0 to 1939 in 3 seconds’: Why Anti-Elon Musk Satire Is Flourishing in Britain
item.description: Humor and art have been used to mock the powerful in Britain for centuries. Now Elon Musk is on the receiving end.
